thread.title: South Africa beats India by 5 runs in 1st ODI
thread.title_full: South Africa beats India by 5 runs in 1st ODI

title: South Africa beats India by 5 runs in 1st ODI
text: South Africa beats India by 5 runs in 1st ODI Sunday, 11 October 2015 (1 minute ago) KANPUR, India (AP) " South Africa defeated India by five runs on Sunday in the first one-day international of a five-game series. Scores:South Africa: 303-5 in 50 overs (A.B. de Villiers 104 not out, Faf du Plessis 62; Amit... 75 DAYS OF EXCITING CRICKET AS INDIA-SOUTH AFRICA FACE OFF 02:28 India vs South Africa, a series has set pulses racing ever since the tour of Sri Lanka ended and is now just a day away, with the two powerhouses of world cricket set to play in three T20s, five ODIs and four Test matches in a tour that will run all the way till early December. Recent related news South Africa beat India by 5 runs in first ODI Kanpur, Oct 11 : India suffered a five-run defeat against South Africa in their first of the five-match One-Day International (ODI) series at the Green Park...
